item.title: CoinShares: Ethereum Drives Record $4.39 Billion in Global Inflows Last WeekCoinShares released its latest weekly report showing that weekly inflows into digital asset products hit a record high of $4.39B, bringing year-to-date inflows to $27.0B and pushing assets under management to a record $220.0B. Ethereum set several important new records, with 2025 inflows now exceeding the total for 2024, reaching $6.20B, and weekly inflows nearly double that of any other week on record, reaching $2.12B. The United States accounted for the vast majority of the flow ($4.36B), while global ETP trading volume hit a record $39.2B, driven by Bitcoin and Ethereum. [Foresight News]

item.title: Data: Hong Kong virtual asset ETF today's transaction volume is about HK$55.7922 millionOn July 21, Hong Kong stock market data showed that as of the close, the transaction volume of all Hong Kong virtual asset ETFs today was approximately HK$55.7922 million. Among them: The transaction volume of China Asset Management Bitcoin ETF (3042.HK/9042.HK/83042.HK) was HK$17.0465 million, and the transaction volume of China Asset Management Ethereum ETF (03046.HK/09046.HK/83046.HK) was HK$27.77655 million; The trading volume of Harvest Bitcoin ETF (03439.HK/09439.HK) was HK$1.2222 million, and the trading volume of Harvest Ethereum ETF (03179.HK/09179.HK) was HK$2.3379 million; The transaction volume of Bosera Bitcoin ETF (03008.HK/09008.HK) was HK$2.2717 million, and the transaction volume of Bosera Ethereum ETF (03009.HK/09009.HK) was HK$5.1413 million. Note: All of the above virtual asset ETFs have Hong Kong dollar counters and US dollar counters, and only two of Hua Xia’s ETFs also have RMB counters. [PANews]

item.title: BTFS 4.0 Introduces the Storage Provider RoleThe BTFS 4.0 network officially introduces the new role of "Storage Provider" to enhance the performance of the BTFS network, including reliability and long-term scalability. As core infrastructure nodes of the network, storage providers must meet stricter standards in terms of hardware configuration, online rate, and service quality, and must be certified by BTTC verification nodes. The plan aims to build a high-performance distributed storage network and promote the sustainable development of the BitTorrent ecosystem. [Odaily]

item.title: Thailand SEC proposes relaxing rules for testing crypto ICO investorsOn July 21, the Securities and Exchange Commission of Thailand (SEC) proposed to relax the knowledge testing requirements for retail crypto investors, allowing investors who have passed the test to be exempted from repeated testing, and changing the current quarterly retesting regulations to a suitability assessment every two years. The new rules require ICO portals to conduct comprehensive suitability testing on all digital token investors to ensure that investment risks match product risks. The proposal aims to reduce the burden on investors and ICO portals while being consistent with existing securities regulatory standards. The SEC is now open for public comments, with a deadline of August 1. [PANews]

In addition, Binance will open trading bot services for the following trading pairs at the same time: Spot algorithmic orders (ETC/USDC, GRT/USDC, ROSE/USDC); Spot Grid and Spot DCA (PENGU/USDC, XLM/USDC). (This news flash is generated with AI assistance) [Odaily News]

item.title: Analysis: NFT rebound suggests traders are rotating out of Bitcoin and exploring other speculative plays in the crypto marketThe total market capitalization of NFTs has now exceeded $6.3 billion, nearly doubling from $3.2 billion less than a month ago. At the same time, Bitcoin's market share has fallen by 6.6% to around 61%. Market analysis suggests that the return of NFTs provides a signal that traders are cycling out of Bitcoin and re-exploring speculative investments in the crypto market. This means that once Bitcoin consolidates and investors begin to shift capital to higher-risk assets, altcoins tend to see more aggressive movements. (DL News) [Odaily Planet Daily]

item.title: Aave community vote approves ARFC proposal to deploy a white-label version of Aave V3 on the Ink chainThe Aave community has passed a proposal authorizing the Ink Foundation to deploy a white-label version of the Aave V3 lending platform on the Ink chain. The platform will be centrally governed by the Ink Foundation, branded as "Powered by Aave," and will not have a governance token. The Aave DAO will receive no less than 5% of the platform's lending revenue as a share. Aave ecosystem service providers (such as ACI, Chaos Labs, etc.) will assist in operation and maintenance for the first 6 months, and Ink will arrange its own commercial support thereafter. Ink has committed to injecting over $250.00M in initial liquidity and reserving 4% of future governance tokens for incentives. The platform is not included in the Aave DAO insurance system, and Ink will exclusively operate the lending protocol for 12 months after deployment. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: A certain whale is currently shorting altcoins with a floating loss of $12.48M.According to on-chain analyst Ai Yi @ai_9684xtpa's monitoring, the wallet address that "once leveraged $2.82M to arbitrage 14.81M USDe" recently opened mixed long and short positions on Hyperliquid. The long positions only include BTC and AAVE, while the remaining 26 currencies are short positions. Currently, only 38% are in a floating profit state, with a cumulative floating loss of $12.48M, of which XRP alone has a loss of $9.00M. [Odaily]

item.title: HTX-sponsored ChainCatcher "Web3 Future Night" themed cocktail party in Hanoi, Vietnam will be held on July 31.The "Web3 Future Night" themed cocktail party, sponsored by HTX and hosted by ChainCatcher, will be grandly held in Hanoi, Vietnam on July 31st from 19:30 - 22:30 (GMT+7). As the third time this brand event has been held in Vietnam, previous events have successfully brought together leading local Vietnamese Web3 project teams, top investors, well-known KOLs, and core community members, creating a highly influential communication platform in the industry. This event will further promote in-depth cooperation and resource docking within the Vietnamese Web3 ecosystem. [ChainCatcher]

item.title: FinTax Founder: Web3-related crypto income may become a focus of taxation in the futureIn recent years, the data analysis capabilities of tax authorities have significantly improved, and tax bureaus have begun to proactively analyze CRS data. As a Chinese tax resident, if your overseas assets and income are conspicuous enough, you are likely to come into the view of the tax bureau. In the long run, these overseas assets will sooner or later face the attention and management of tax authorities. This reflects the upgrading of the collection and management mechanism—based on specific risk indicators, using internal "five-step work method" and other means to conduct a systematic assessment of the overseas income of natural persons. Currently, common targets of verification include those who invest in Hong Kong and US stocks, and those who realize overseas equity in Internet companies. However, Web3-related crypto income may become one of the focuses in the future. [Securities Times]

item.title: Swedish listed company H100 Group plans to raise $1.50M to increase its holdings of BitcoinPublicly listed company H100 Group announced that its board of directors has decided to conduct a directed issue of up to 1,523,089 new shares to certain qualified investors at a price of SEK 9.30 per share, with total proceeds expected to be approximately SEK 14.10 million (approximately $1.50 million). The announcement stated that the net proceeds from this fundraising will be used to seek new investment opportunities within its Bitcoin reserve strategy framework. [Odaily]
